analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo
analyzed: na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya

original: sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca

original: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo
analyzed: na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya

original: sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhamma

original: paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya
analyzed: na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca adukkham asukhāya vedanāya

original: sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ
analyzed: sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayutta

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naadukkhamasukhāya
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na adukkhamasukhāya

original: vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekavīsa adhipatiyā ekavīsa pe avigate ekavīsa
